flawed_nl_solution:
In five years, Phoebe will be 10+5 = <<10+5=11>>11 years old.
If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be 4*11 = <<4*11=44>>44 years old in 5 years.
Currently, Raven is 44-5 = <<44-5=39>>39 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
